column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Ann - Thank you for the updated review. We are very happy to hear that your experience with us has been consistently good. We strive for consistency in everything we do on a daily basis
column2: but it doesn't always work out that way. So it's nice to hear about it when it does. I'm glad you enjoyed our fare
column3: and we appreciate your kind words very much. Please come back soon!
